name: Paladin Tristan
descriptions: Paladin Tristan is a member of Lyons' Brotherhood of Steel in 2277.

Tristan was involved with the original expedition that found the Pentagon ruins with Elder Lyons. He has trained Sarah Lyons since she was young and he has a professional relationship with her. Tristan is loyal to Lyons and follows his direction and ideals of the Brotherhood's future closely. Tristan is wise and has a serious nature.

Tristan has climbed through the ranks of the Brotherhood of Steel and attained the status of a paladin. He acts as an operation specialist, planning many of the offensives in defeating the Enclave in the Capital Wasteland. Tristan is responsible for the daily operations of the Citadel and he helps assist Paladin Gunny with training new members. He is often found wandering the Citadel's main control room area, which is the old bay for Liberty Prime.
He approved the loadout of Squad 7 for the assault on Adams Air Force Base.

He is the acting field commander of the Brotherhood forces in light of Sarah Lyons being unable to fight after the events at the purifier, and is in charge of all Brotherhood operations involving the Lone Wanderer and Liberty Prime, the first mission in the main Broken Steel questline.
Paladin Tristan appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Broken Steel.

topics.topic_text: That's all I needed.
topics.response_text: If you say so.

topics.topic_text: DLC03AudioBoSOrders
topics.response_text: This is Paladin Tristan.

topics.topic_text: That's it.
topics.response_text: Okay. It's about time to move out.

topics.topic_text: Has the Enclave been putting up much of a fight?
topics.response_text: Not like they did at the purifier, no.

topics.topic_text: I've got a few questions for you.
topics.response_text: Well, we've got a bit of time. What's on your mind?

topics.topic_text: What happened back at the purifier?
topics.response_text: Well, you saw most of the fighting outside. The robot paved the way for us, we just mopped up the opposition while you and Sarah headed inside.

topics.topic_text: So what's next after this?
topics.response_text: We'll strip the place for any usable tech, like always.

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'm ready to go.
topics.response_text: All right. You stay back with me and keep safe. Once we've reached the facility, we'll talk about who does what.

topics.topic_text: What do you need me to do?
topics.response_text: I need you to keep your head on straight. No heroics, okay?

topics.topic_text: Good to see you, too. I'm here to help.
topics.response_text: Is that so? Well, it'll be good to have another soldier we can count on.

topics.topic_text: How about we skip the pleasantries and get to work.
topics.response_text: Well... All business now, are we?

topics.topic_text: Elder Lyons said you needed help, so here I am.
topics.response_text: Fair enough.

topics.topic_text: So you're in charge now, huh?
topics.response_text: Until Sarah gets back on her feet, I'm running the Pride. It's just temporary.

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'm going.
topics.response_text: Be careful in there. Who knows what else they're going to throw at us.

topics.topic_text: What am I looking for?
topics.response_text: I don't know, I don't know! Terminals, data, anything that can help us figure out what just happened, and where it came from.

topics.topic_text: Hey, wait! You said you didn't need my help!
topics.response_text: Yeah, well that was before they blew up our one advantage. Consider it a field promotion. Now get going!

topics.topic_text: This isn't what I signed up for.
topics.response_text: At this point, this isn't what ANY of us signed up for. We can't let them get the advantage now. Get moving!

topics.topic_text: I found some encrypted data on one of their terminals.
topics.response_text: Let's hope the Scribes can make sense of it. Get it back to the Citadel and get it to Rothchild as fast as you can.

topics.topic_text: I found something, but I'm not sure what.
topics.response_text: Don't worry about that. The Scribes can figure it out; it's their damn job.

topics.topic_text: I'm on my way back to the Citadel now.
topics.response_text: Good. Let's hope the Scribes can do something useful with it before the Enclave pulls another fast one on us.

topics.topic_text: Old Olney is a dangerous place. Is there anything I could have to help me?
topics.response_text: Check with Scribe Vallincourt. She's been researching some of the Enclave technology we've recovered.

topics.topic_text: I'm ready for more. What do you need?
topics.response_text: With the setbacks the Brotherhood has suffered, we find ourselves in a difficult position.

topics.topic_text: Any job you've got, I can do.
topics.response_text: I hope that's true. With all of the Brotherhood's resources committed to protecting against an Enclave attack, we're spread thin.

topics.topic_text: Do I get paid for it?
topics.response_text: Paid? No. Perhaps there's been some misunderstanding about how this all works.

topics.topic_text: Olney Powerworks? What's there?
topics.response_text: Hopefully you'll be able to find a Tesla Coil, an experimental device from before the war.

topics.topic_text: You want me to go all the way to Olney?
topics.response_text: I need you to go there, and quickly.

topics.topic_text: Olney? No, I don't think so.
topics.response_text: I'm sorry, perhaps there was a misunderstanding.

topics.topic_text: Sorry, it was just a joke.
topics.response_text: I see. You'll forgive my lack of humor, given that we face annihilation on a daily basis.

topics.topic_text: You don't have much of a sense of humor, do you?
topics.response_text: I have yet to find a sense of humor to be essential to my survival.

topics.topic_text: I don't get paid? At all? This gig sucks.
topics.response_text: I cannot imagine how you've come this far being under such a delusion.

topics.topic_text: I'm good to go. What's next?
topics.response_text: Based on the data you brought us from the relay station, we've identified where the Enclave is basing their operation.

topics.topic_text: I need a break. Olney was tougher than I thought.
topics.response_text: Time is running out. If we don't take the fight to the Enclave soon, they're going to bring it to us, and that won't end well.

topics.topic_text: I've got to ask... why am I going through the Presidential Metro alone?
topics.response_text: We need to send you in one way, and the bulk of our guys in another.

topics.topic_text: Directions to the Presidential Metro would be helpful, Tristan.
topics.response_text: Yeah, it's a bit tricky to find, but you'll manage.

topics.topic_text: Sounds like I'm walking into the airbase blind.
topics.response_text: Don't worry about it. I wouldn't send you on some sort of suicide mission without some intelligence to back it up.

topics.topic_text: What can I expect to find in the Presidential Metro?
topics.response_text: The best information we have is that the place still has an active automated security contingent. You should watch yourself.

topics.topic_text: I've got blood samples to turn in.
topics.response_text: Good job. I'll inform Lyons of your progress.

topics.topic_text: Is there anything else I can do to help the Brotherhood?
topics.response_text: Well, yes actually. If you're still up for it, I could always use a hand with my next assignment.

topics.topic_text: So, what happens to the Brotherhood now?
topics.response_text: Well, the Enclave might not be a threat anymore, but we're not done by a long shot.

topics.topic_text: So, have we totally wiped out the Enclave?
topics.response_text: Nah. There'll be stragglers and patrols still wandering the Wasteland. They won't know what happened at Adams probably for months.

topics.topic_text: DLC03TransitionTopic
topics.response_text: What the hell happened in here... Oh, man... We've got people down in here! You, check that equipment! The two of you, over here - help me get them..

topics.topic_text: Where can I find Scribe Jameson?
topics.response_text: She spends most of her time in the Archives. You'll find them in A Ring, near the great hall.

topics.topic_text: All right then.
topics.response_text: Glad to be of help.

topics.topic_text: Can someone in the Citadel train me to wear Power Armor?
topics.response_text: I’m sure Gunny could train you, but he won’t. Not without permission from Elder Lyons. You should ask him... he’s usually near the Lab.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Any last minute questions?

topics.topic_text: Did you know that Paulie Cantelli is an addict?
topics.response_text: He's totally strung out. It's going to kill him one of these days.

conversation.response_text: Enclave strength is at 100%. They're getting reinforcements from somewhere, but we still haven't determined the location of their headquarters.
Hmm... All right, thanks for the information.
There's more of them than I expected. They're really entrenched here. Something must be up...
This is it... let's make this one count.
Let's do this just like the last time. Nobody needs to try and prove anything out there.

combat.response_text: Do you have any idea who you're dealing with?
